attributes.title: Oh no, he’s done it again
attributes.review: He’s managed to break my phone and ruin my life with his useless app

attributes.title: Bleep Bloop Big Oof
attributes.review: This app was supposed to give me high hopes for Merica. Unfortunately, just like my will to live, that hope doesn’t exist...

attributes.title: IT WILL MAKE YOUR PHONE CRASH
attributes.review: Literally all this app did was give me crashes & glitches , don’t waste your time. It deserves 1 star.

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: This is the worst app on the market. I downloaded it and immediately got my identity stolen. This app single handedly ruined my life.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: What kind of app is this it took about 2 weeks to download and it was a waste of time

attributes.title: I was a trump fan
attributes.review:
I was a trump fan until this app. This app is disgusting and does not accurately represent MAGA!!!🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢
Don’t download. It’s spreading false information about our dear dear trump. 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Before I could even put my phone number it crashed. Worst app ever

attributes.title: AWFUL!!
attributes.review: this is a very bad app and i don’t recommend it AT ALL it is a span and i hate it!!! not only did my child ALMOST DIE she got severely sick from it!! TAKE THIS OFF THE APP STORE!!

attributes.title: Bye bye ✨🌸🧚🏼✨
attributes.review:
